profileAlternative.name: Katherine M. Bell
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist | Data Analyst
profileAlternative.summary:
Analytics professional with experience working with data for clients across a number of industries developing insights for sales and marketing teams, and senior stakeholders. Experience working at early-stage startups in operations and account management roles delivering data-driven analysis to platform partners. Recent work includes applying unsupervised clustering algorithms to hiring and using NLP and unsupervised learning to classify S-1 documents.

• Skills: Python, SQL, MongoDB, Machine Learning algorithms
• Education: Degree in Urban Studies, Metis Data Science Bootcamp Alumn

positions.title: Metis
positions.description:
-Act as a resource for students learning the EDA process, machine learning algorithms, developing and deploying web applications, and data visualization.
-Recommend optimal specifications for project design, data pipelines, and debugging, as well as tactics to overcome technical obstacles.
-Provided code reviews for 25 students to identify areas of improvement and provide detailed notes for optimal implementation.

positions.title: Independent Consultant
positions.description:
Data analysis consultant. Worked with a variety of clients across industries to analyze their data and develop dashboards. Industries included food import companies, distribution services, startups and nonprofits.
...

given.text: Katherine is one of the smartest people I have ever worked with. She is always learning new things, teaching herself and challenging herself. She brings value to any team that she joins and rolls up her sleeves to get the job done. Any team would be lucky to have her!

Katherine is a ball of awesome. In a matter of months she picked up SQL and could write new queries using a complicated schema. She is a person you want to have around in a crisis situation: level-headed and practical even under pressure. Her positive, helpful personality is infectious and makes everyone around her better. See less

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Data Science Fellow at Galvanize, Inc.
Leader I Veteran I MBA Candidate at Washington University in St. Louis
